document.full_text: thai police said on thursday they had no evidence to indicate troops killed reuters cameraman hiro muramoto last year, backing a recent reversal of preliminary findings that a soldier may have fired the fatal bullet.
document.title: no proof thai troops killed reuters cameraman: police
lines_and_colors: thai police said on thursday they had no evidence to indicate troops killed reuters cameraman hiro muramoto last year, backing a recent reversal of preliminary findings that a soldier may have fired the fatal bullet.
